name: LiteBitcoin
description: Bitcoin reborn as LiteBitcoin (LBTC), it is an experimental new digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world. LiteBitcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. LiteBitcoin is also the name of the open source software which enables the use of this currency.
